typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		modifiedby as string,
		modifiedon as string,
		hpi_noteshistory as string,
		createdon as string,
		hpi_subject as string,
		hpi_caseid as string,
		incidentid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	singleDocument: true) ~> source1
source(output(
		modifiedby as string,
		modifiedon as string,
		hpi_noteshistory as string,
		createdon as string,
		hpi_subject as string,
		hpi_caseid as string,
		incidentid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	singleDocument: true) ~> source2
source1, source2 join(source1@hpi_caseid == source2@hpi_caseid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
